name: Rolling Penguin
description:
Game created for the GMTK Game Jam!

The theme was only one, so this game use only one button and has only one level. To play you can use space or left click to power the little penguin to the sky. Try co carry the momentum to jump even higher.

Have fun, as I had making it, and comment please, it means a lot.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Fuzzball Parade" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
